title: New: London Grammar – Feelings
body:
Continuing their rise to fame with recent video release _Strong_, UK trio **London Grammar** show yet again why they’re one of the most hotly tipped acts around at the moment in time.

New track, _Feelings_ the flip side to the aforementioned Strong, is a percussion led beauty, almost relying solely on the powerful vocals and tribal-esque drum beat. Check out _Feelings_ below, and keep your ears open for their debut LP If You Wait, out 9 September.
